statements: DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE robot_id = 100 AND robot_name = 'R2D2'
DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Robotics' AND production_date < '2019-01-01'
DELETE FROM orders WHERE component_id = 3 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM components WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND cost < 100.00;
DELETE FROM Robots WHERE production_year < 2010 AND manufacturer = 'Sony';
DELETE FROM Parts WHERE unit_price > 1000 OR quantity_in_stock = 0;
